HelpBalloon.title: Disk space left
HelpBalloon.content: This display provides you with an overview of the current capacity utilization level of your hard disk storage based on the log files generated by the EMM. The display changes colour as the capacity utilization level increases, <75%: Green, <90%: Yellow, >=90%: Red, and serves as an early indicator for you to recognize a complete utilization of the storage space.
